message: Let's make a deal, Bob. This offer leaves us both with something.
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 is a fair deal!
Bob, let's be reasonable. My offer is generous and avoids us wasting more rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, 55-45 is a more balanced split. Let's settle on this before we run out of rounds!
Bob, I'm being flexible, but we need to reach an agreement soon. This is my final offer.

Alice, we're halfway through the rounds and I'm getting a bit concerned we won't reach an agreement. I've compromised further, 52-48 is a very fair split at this point. Let's end this before it's too late!
Bob, time is running out. This is a fair offer considering we have less than half the rounds remaining.
Alice, we're really running out of time now. I'm willing to meet you exactly in the middle - 50-50. This is the most fair offer possible. If you reject this, I fear we'll both end up with nothing.
